metadata.title: CVE-2015-3232 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Open redirect vulnerability in the Field UI module in Drupal 7.x before7.38 allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary web sites andconduct phishing attacks via a URL in the destinations parameter.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
